official_title: A bill to amend the Hazardous Materials Transportation Act to prohibit the transportation of radioactive materials to or from any civilian airport, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Hazardous Materials Transportation Act to direct the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations prohibiting the transportation of radioactive materials to or from any non-military airport except where such materials are to be used during a national emergency or for emergency medical diagnosis or treatment. Direct the Secretary to prohibit the transportation of such materials to or from military airports which are located within a standard metropolitan statistical district of more than 300,000 people.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Hazardous Materials Transportation Act to prohibit the transportation of radioactive materials to or from any civilian airport, and for other purposes.
